overview:
Pablo A. Mart√≠nez is a Spanish tech entrepreneur based in Barcelona. He and his brother has created four companies, (the first company when he was 19 years old), INTERACTIVOS.NET a Digital Communication Agency. Co-founder in SAURION.com in 2009 a leading Mobile Commerce Platform in Spain.

He has participated in other online start-ups as a Business Angel and advisor, like Fever.

He is currently Supplier Relations Coordinator in Neodalia.com, a flash deals marketplace of design products focus in the Spanish market. He is based in Barcelona.
